pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, January 13, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, January 13, 2017:

Quinte West, Ontario

7:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will have breakfast with members of the Canadian Armed Forces and their families.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


Bewdley, Ontario  

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Rhinoâ€™s Roadhouse restaurant.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


Peterborough, Ontario

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Evinrude Centre
911 Monaghan Road
Peterborough, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks and Q&A
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Evinrude Centre
911 Monaghan Road
Peterborough, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.


Toronto, Ontario

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet youth from the La Loche community at the Toronto Raptors training facility.

BioSteel Centre
30 British Columbia Road
Toronto, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


London, Ontario

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Alumni Hall
University of Western Ontario
Lambton Drive
London, ON

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks and Q&A
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:00 p.m.
